clusters.title: Error leaves 55,000 diabetes patients needing new tests
clusters.neutral_headline: Error leaves 55,000 diabetes patients needing new tests

items.title: Error leaves 55,000 diabetes patients needing new tests
items.standfirst: Errors by diabetes analysis machines mean at least 55,000 people in England will need further hospital tests.
items.content: Errors by diabetes analysis machines mean at least 55,000 people in England will need further hospital tests.

clusters.title: How to see Sunday's 'Blood Moon' total lunar eclipse
clusters.neutral_headline: How to see Sunday's 'Blood Moon' total lunar eclipse

items.title: How to see Sunday's 'Blood Moon' total lunar eclipse
items.standfirst: A total lunar eclipse will be visible from parts of the UK on Sunday evening, weather permitting.
items.content: A total lunar eclipse will be visible from parts of the UK on Sunday evening, weather permitting.
